1.title: Classics Illustrated.
1.author: [No author]
notes: Published no. 35 (March. 1947) - no. 169 (Spring 1969).
Issues numbered 1-34 exist and are reprints of material previously published as Classic Comics.
Special issues were published, numbered 129A, 132A, 135A, 138A, 141A, 147A, 150A, 152A, 156A, 159A, 162A, 165A, 166A, 167A, and one unnumbered special issue.
For contents of each issue held see following entries. Typically the MSU Library holds several different printings of each issue, and only one is listed here.
Educational comics.
